struct.exostring: // DIALOGUE // after the player becomes a padawan
// DIALOGUE // the first time after the jedi becomes a padawan
// DIALOGUE // after the character has become an apprentice but before becoming a jedi
// DIALOGUE // the first time after saving juhani

// SCRIPTED // before the player is accepted into jedi training first time only
Dialog Mission Statement These dialogs are for Belaya, a Jedi wandering around the courtyard in the Jedi Enclave. She comments on the players actions when different quests are completed.
The first dialog is when she first approaches the player (scripted to be the first time the player enters the courtyard). The second dialog is subsequent talks before the player has become an apprentice. The third dialog is Belaya commenting on the player redeeming Juhani. The fourth dialog is Belaya commenting on the player killing Juhani. The fifth dialog is subsequent conversations while the player is an apprentice. The sixth dialog is the first time Belaya talks to the player upon becoming a Padawan. The seventh dialog is Belaya commenting on the player returning Shen to Ahlan. The eighth dialog is Belaya commenting on Shen and Rahasia running away to the Enclave. The ninth dialog is Belaya commenting on Nurik accepting Shen and Rahasia. The tenth dialog is subsequent conversations while the player is a Padawan.
Exit points in conversation:
Exit stream 1: All conversations lead into stream 2. DAN_DONE_BELAYAM is set to true to show the Belaya has met the player.
Exit stream 2: The line is said and the conversation ends.
Exit stream 3: The line is said and the conversation ends. DAN_DONE_BELAYAJ is set to true to show that this line has been said.
Exit stream 4: The line is said and the conversation ends. DAN_DONE_BELAYAJ is set to true to show that this line has been said.
Exit stream 5: Belaya can wish the player luck (wth the possibility of a minor dark side hit for arrogance), or she can tell the player the Jedi Code.
Exit stream 6: The lines are said and the conversation ends. DAN_DONE_BELAYAT is set to true to show that the line has been said.
Exit stream 7: The line is said and the player responds and the conversation ends. There is the possibility of a minor dark side hit for being too greedy. DAN_DONE_BELAYAS is set to true to show that the romance result has been commented upon.
Exit stream 8: The lines are said and the conversation ends. The player can link into stream 9 for a single line of dialog and then ends. DAN_DONE_BELAYAS is set to true to show that the romance result has been commented upon.
Exit stream 9: The lines are said and the conversation ends. DAN_DONE_BELAYAS is set to true to show that the romance result has been commented upon.
Exit stream 10: Both player responses link back to stream 5 and end with Belaya's lines. NOTE: there is a possibility of a minor dark side hit in this conversation (for arrogance), that the player could exploit and use over and over by always choosing the arrogant path and starting the conversation again.
// DIALOGUE // after the character has become an apprentice but before becoming a jedi
